events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but need to return it because the size is too small and I would like a refund.
The customer's case was reviewed and identified as a refund request due to size issues.
The case was assigned to Agent Maria for handling the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to return your jacket for a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
My order number is 789654123. The jacket is brand new and has not been worn. I just need a size exchange or refund.
We can process a full refund once the jacket is returned. I will send you a prepaid return label to your email shortly.
Thank you! That sounds great. I appreciate your quick help with this refund process.
The return label has been emailed to you. Please send the jacket back at your earliest convenience, and your refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to see if you have received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I received the label and have already shipped the jacket back today. Thanks again for your help!
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Your refund case is now closed. Please feel free to contact us if you need any further assistance in the future.
